RBA Validated Assessment Program (VAP) Standard

Version: 8.0.2

Description

The RBA VAP Standard provides comprehensive guidance for deeper understanding of the Responsible Business Alliance Code of Conduct, offering elements to demonstrate compliance with the RBA Code for companies implementing the RBA Code of Conduct in their operations.

Conformity Criteria

  • Labor (v1)
  • Health and Safety (v1)
  • Environment (v1)
  • Ethics (v1)
  • Supply Chain Management (v1)
